(NASDAQ:AMD), even after the company topped revenue estimates for the fiscal second quarter of 2025. The stock has fallen more than 9% since August 5 on valuation concerns. […]

headline: Broadcom (AVGO) Stock Trades Down, Here Is Why
summary: Shares of fabless chip and software maker Broadcom (NASDAQ:AVGO) fell 3.3% in the morning session after a broader pullback sparked by reports that China banned its major tech firms from buying U.S. artificial intelligence chips. The negative sentiment weighed heavily on the Nasdaq, with the news first hitting chipmaker Nvidia and then rippling out to drag down fellow tech giants, including Broadcom.

headline: A Look at AMD’s Valuation Following Strategic AI Partnerships and Growing Cloud Adoption
summary: If you have been following Advanced Micro Devices (AMD), you know the company has just made headlines with its latest strategic alliances. AMD revealed a collaboration with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure and Absci, aimed at pushing the boundaries of AI-driven drug discovery. By combining Absci’s generative AI platform with Oracle’s infrastructure and AMD’s newest Instinct GPUs, they are taking a shot at accelerating complex biologics design in ways that could ripple through both healthcare and...

headline: AI Chips Update - UK Boosts AI Power With Massive NVIDIA GPU Deployment
summary: Nscale, in collaboration with leading US technology companies Microsoft, NVIDIA, and OpenAI, has announced a significant commitment to developing AI infrastructure in the UK. As part of this initiative, Nscale will construct the nation's largest AI supercomputer and establish Stargate UK, a platform designed to deploy OpenAI's technology with a focus on sovereign workloads. This ambitious plan involves deploying up to 58,640 NVIDIA GPUs across various UK sites and is a part of a broader...

headline: Nvidia Stock Drops on Report China Has Banned Its Chips. What It Means for Investors.
summary: China's internet regulator told ByteDance and Alibaba to end testing and orders of Nvidia’s tailor-made products for the country., a media report said.

headline: AMD (AMD) Downgraded to Hold by Erste Group on Margin Concerns
